mapper.insert: insert into Repair (start_date, VIN, odometer_reading, customer_id, service_writer_user_name, description ) values(now(), #{VIN}, #{odometer_reading}, #{customer_id}, #{service_writer_user_name}, #{description})
mapper.update: update Repair set label_charge = #{label_charge}, description = #{description} where VIN = #{VIN} and start_date = #{start_date}
update Repair set complete_date = now() where VIN = #{VIN} and start_date = #{start_date}
mapper.insert: insert into Part (start_date, VIN, vendor_name, part_name, unit_price, quantity) values(#{start_date}, #{VIN}, #{vendor_name}, #{part_name}, #{unit_price}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: select * from Part where start_date = #{start_date}, vin = #{vin}, vendor_name = #{vendor_name}, part_name = #{part_name}
